title: cis software cep
content:
Hello testing 
bold first
i am bold
checking w caps lock
I AM BOLD
checking w shortcut key (+shift)
I AM BOLD (bold is working)
italic second
i am italic 
ITALIC
ITALIC
italic + bold -> italicbold, ITALICBOLD
underline now (italic bhi, bold bhi hai abhi) works!
normal text now
saving the document w ctrl + s
